title: guys look at my funny roles

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
Everyone looks at your roles. Add up all of the relevant roles and see their **Card Shard** üîπ point values. Have 2 targets (may be the same person) gain that many **Card Shards** üîπ. Negative **Card Shards** remove current ones first and then lead to 1 card discarded per 3.
